Posts.Content: Jan 9, 2008 12:23PM LH1025 wrote: It's okay Joni, you can do it.  I received news from my scans yesterday that I now have a new lesion on my hip.  I was hoping to have surgery to remove the tumor in breast but we have to put this on hold until we get the lesion on my hip and back stable.  It's amazing what you can do!  Just keep thinking positive thoughts and know God is in control!!!!!
Posts.Title: Scan results not good jonimb jonimb
